title: A Startup Complements Kubernetes, Docker and Wasm at the Edge
author: Alex Williams
description: Expanso has created Bacalhau, an open source architecture that allows users to run compute jobs where the data is generated and stored.
cntitle: 一家初创公司在边缘端对 Kubernetes、Docker 和 Wasm 进行补充
cndescription: Expanso 创建了 Bacalhau，这是一个开源架构，允许用户在数据生成和存储的地方运行计算作业。
